VASSAL.tools.swing

Class Progressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • VASSAL.tools.concurrent.RangedRunnable<java.lang.Integer>
      • VASSAL.tools.swing.Progressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Progressor

    public abstract class Progressor
extends RangedRunnable<java.lang.Integer>
    A progress handler.
    Since:
    3.1.11

        protected final int max

    • Constructor Detail

      • Progressor

        public Progressor(int init,
                  int max)
        Creates a Progressor with the given bounds.
        Parameters:
        init - the initial progress value
        max - the maximum progress value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if init is not in [0,max]
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if max &lt; 0

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(int prog)
        Sets the progress. Setting the progress submits the Runnable only when it would result in a change in the progress percentage.
        Parameters:
        prog - the new progress value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if prog is not in [0,max]
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if prog &lt;= current value

        Gets the progress.
        Returns:
        the progress value
